title: Boots Riley on Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
itunes:title: Boots Riley on Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
description:
Boots Riley is one cool dude. Though he and Chuck had never met, they took to each other right away and talked about music, filmmaking, writing, art, activism and philosophy. After a long career as leader of hip-hop band The Coup, Boots was in Atlanta to promote his debut film as writer/director, Sorry to Bother You.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
